name: capture-wrapper-desktop
description: Ground station software for the Icarus CanSat (Desktop version)

scripts.start: NODE_ENV='dev' electron . & browser-sync start --server ui --files ui --no-open
scripts.postinstall: IOJS_ORG_MIRROR=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell npm rebuild --runtime=electron --target=1.3.3 --arch=x64 --build-from-source && echo 'Using until electron-rebuild supports the new electron package.'
